examples.korean: He thought it improvident of me to spend so much on a jacket so early on in the college term. 발음듣기 그는 내가 대학 시절 너무 일찍부터 재킷에 그렇게 많은 돈을 쓰는 것은 헤픈 짓이라고 생각했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He thought it improvident of me to spend so much on a jacket so early on in the college term. 발음

examples.korean: During the 1980s, the business jet was vilified as an evidence of corporate conspicuous consumption. 발음듣기 1980년대에 업무용 제트항공기들은 기업의 헤픈 씀씀이의 증거로 비난 받았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: During the 1980s, the business jet was vilified as an evidence of corporate conspicuous consumption. 발음

examples.korean: Do not blame young people but their parents who raised them for supposedly profligate habits. 발음듣기 씀씀이가 헤픈 것에 대해 젊은이들을 탓하지 말고 그렇게 길러낸 부모들을 탓하라. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do not blame young people but their parents who raised them for supposedly profligate habits. 발음

examples.korean: He is a lavish spender. 발음듣기 그는 씀씀이가 헤픈 사람이다. English Hidden Card
examples.english: He is a lavish spender. 발음

examples.korean: good[bad] husbandry 발음듣기 규모 있는[헤픈] 살림살이. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
